Source.Name: faad
Source.Summary: Open source MPEG-2 and MPEG-4 AAC decoder
Source.Description: Freeware Advanced Audio (AAC) Decoder is a HE, LC, MAIN and LTP profile, MPEG-2 and MPEG-4 AAC decoder. FAAD2 includes code for SBR (HE AAC) decoding.

Package.Description: Freeware Advanced Audio (AAC) Decoder is a HE, LC, MAIN and LTP profile, MPEG-2 and MPEG-4 AAC decoder. FAAD2 includes code for SBR (HE AAC) decoding.
